text:
@realDonaldTrump The country is burning. 101,000+ Americans have died from #COVID19. All under your watch. While you either golf or hide in a bunker. You are a disgrace. 

cc: @PressSec, @VP @GOPChairwoman @GOP @GOPLeader @SenateGOP @HouseGOP https://t.co/rmeDT62ao5
